name: do-something-constructive
description: A web application to help you deciding to do something constructive

scripts.build:debug: npm run clean && npm run copy:debug && npm run browserify:debug
scripts.build:release: npm run clean && npm run copy:release && npm run minifycss && npm run browserify:release
scripts.clean: rimraf build && mkdirp build/js && mkdirp build/css
scripts.copy:release: cpy 'src/index.html' build && cpy 'assets/**/*.*' ../build --cwd=src --parents && cpy 'src/js/sw.js' build && cpy 'src/manifest.json' build
